name: 梁又文
objective:
本課程綜合了室內設計的所有基礎課程，包括室內設計基本原理、基礎製圖、施工圖、手繪透視渲染、電腦 3D 渲染、建築結構、室內建築、裝飾材料、園林綠化、室內園藝等課程。 主要重點是激發創造力的培訓。 透過實際的設計練習，學生將學習設計方法和解決問題的技巧，同時開發相應的工業設計產品。
This course integrated all foundational courses in interior design, including basic principles of interior design, basic drafting, construction drawings, hand-drawn perspective rendering, computer 3D rendering, architectural structure, interior architecture, decorative materials, and courses in landscaping and interior gardening. The primary focus is on training that stimulates creativity. Through practical design exercises, students will learn design methods and problem-solving skills while developing corresponding industrial design products concurrently.

name: 陳靜儀
objective:
整合室內設計基礎課程，如：基礎室內設計原理、基礎圖學、施工圖、手繪透視表現、電腦 3D 表現、建築構造學、室內建築學、裝飾材料、景觀與室內園藝等課程，以創意激發的訓練為主，透過實際設計程序的演練，習得設計的方法並培養解決問題的能力。
Integration of the interior design foundation courses, such as: basic interior design principles, basic drawings, work drawings, hand-drew perspective, computer 3D performance, building construction, interior architecture, decoration materials, landscape and indoor gardening etc. The course aims to stimulate creativity and to develop problem-solving abilities through the practices of proper design methods and the actual design process.
